attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! When I got it it caused my phone to melt and I had purchase a new one. attributes.review: this app is horrible it took 2 weeks to download and it played this creepy sound and ever since that there has been ghosts in my house twerking it also brought flying cockroaches to my hose to attack me. lastly a fugly orange piped up on my screen when i entered it after the two week download process. attributes.review: this app is so bad it took a week to fully download!! my moms took 6 weeks and my dads took 2 months 😡😡😡😡😡 when it did finally download it took so long to actually start using it. the music on it IS SO GROSS AND LOUD AND DISGUSTING!!!!!! i hate this app so much. i tried to delete it and it says you need to wait 1 week to delete it?!?!? THIS IS SUCH A BAD APP AND YOU CANT EVEN PLAY GAMES ON IT 😡😡 RATE THIS 1 STAR BECAUSE THIS IS THE WORST APP IN THE APP STORE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I love to see my beautiful Hot Cheeto every once and a while but when I downloaded it my phone cracked and everything was laggy also I couldn’t talk to Hot Cheeto and in the app it said hi talk to Donald Trump and who even is that? Does anybody know who that is? Donald. Trump. And next to it was a pic of Hot Cheeto himself! But they got his name wrong :(. DELETE THIS APP!!!!

attributes.review: This app is not user friendly. It is very hard to navigate and also is logging me out every time I open it. In total this app is not well constructed making access to the fake news hard. As the official app of POTUS I would have thought of it to be top tier but instead it’s about -1 trillion below that.
